APC.label: Site supplier ?
APC.description: If the supplier level is site, an AP approval will be needed.
APC.algoParams:
SELECT sup_id FROM t_sup_supplier_level
WHERE sup_id = @x_id AND lvl_code = 'sit'

DOCA.label: Documents waiting for approval
DOCA.description: Activity automatically validated when all mandatory documents are approved and active

DOCC.label: Documents accurate ?
DOCC.description: Control if all mandatory documents are validated and active (based on alerts configured)
DOCC.algoParams: SELECT * FROM t_bas_error_x WHERE otype_code='supplier' AND x_id=@x_id AND error_code ='SUP_DOC_V'

RSK.label: Risk Assessment Required?
RSK.algoParams:
SELECT sup.sup_id
FROM t_sup_supplier sup
INNER JOIN t_sup_supplier_risk_factor sup_risk ON sup_risk.sup_id = sup.sup_id
WHERE sup.sup_id=@x_id
